metadata.inclusion: With the gas valve closed, hold the (-) button for 5 seconds until you hear one beep and 'P' blinks on the LCD.
metadata.exclusion: With the gas valve closed, hold the (-) button for 5 seconds until you hear one beep and 'P' blinks on the LCD.
metadata.reset: With the gas valve closed, hold the (-) button for 15 seconds until you hear one beep and 'FS' is displayed on the LCD.
